name: iceland-quakes
description: Visualisation app for earthquakes in Iceland

scripts.build-dev: npm run build-js & npm run build-css
scripts.build-prod: browserify ./map.js > ./dist/bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [es2015] ] -t uglifyify && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.clean: rm dist/bundle.js || true && rm dist/bundle.css || true
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build-prod
scripts.deploy: npm run release && git add dist/ && git commit -m "Release at $(date)" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: Alex Revell
